attributes.action: Find remedy and reparation to the wrongful exclusion of H.M.S. Concord, from the 1949 Yangtze Campaign Awards System.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being held under the reference DKNS 1 within the Churchill College Archives Centre, Cambridge, are papers and  naval signals concerning the "Amethyst Incident" along with the writings of Rear Admiral Sir David Scott.

The papers, naval signals and writings of Rear Admiral Sir David Scott, establish's the fact that on the 30th July 1949 was ordered into the Yangtze Kiaing River, to train its armament on the Woosung Forts, on that river, in readiness to respond, in the event of Amethyst being fired upon while passing that location.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
